attributes.action: examine the livelehood of Ethiopians affected by drought in the Greater Horn of Africa, affecting 11 m people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Drought responses rely heavily on food aid, but more long - term effective measures, suggest ID21, the relief organisation, in their latest bulletin, maybe to look at livestock destocking, 

Again, USAID is leading the way, with brilliance - and the petitioner is urging the P.M. to look at structural weaknesses (though the newsletter doesn't say what they are !) in the African marketing industry as a developmental policy. Protecting core cattle, helps families buy food but the main point of the ID21 report states that insufficient attention is paid to livelhood protection and support.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
